Rooms exist on all participating servers at the same time; media such as images are also duplicated. You can replace matrix-client.matrix.org by any other participating homeserver and still get the media. content.body: DerekNonGeneric: I think the difference with thumbnails is that the homeserver doesn't have to process the full-res image, it can just store it as is. But for generating thumbnails, the homeserver has to parse the image, and the billion laughs attack is a well known denial of service attack against XML formats
